Sentencas: This study proposes an ammonia -fed cascade recirculation system comprising: (1) two stacks connected in series and (2) an anode off -gas recirculation configuration to enhance electrical efficiency of the system.
Titulo: Energetic and economic analysis of novel cascade systems for ammonia-fed solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: The proposed system is both energetically and economically investigated.
Titulo: Energetic and economic analysis of novel cascade systems for ammonia-fed solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: Under energetic analysis, the effects of fuel utilization, temperature, and recirculation rate, are clarified.
Titulo: Energetic and economic analysis of novel cascade systems for ammonia-fed solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: Information from energetic analysis is employed to investigate levelized cost of electricity (LCOE) value in the entire working range.
Titulo: Energetic and economic analysis of novel cascade systems for ammonia-fed solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: Due to the high potential of the cascade configuration, a cascade system without recirculation is also investigated using the same methods.
Titulo: Energetic and economic analysis of novel cascade systems for ammonia-fed solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: The results reveal that the cascade -only and cascade recirculation systems obtain electrical efficiency up to 67.78% and 68.80%, respectively.
Titulo: Energetic and economic analysis of novel cascade systems for ammonia-fed solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: The minimum LCOEs are 0.485 and 0.486 $/kWh, respectively, which are both higher than grid electricity cost; however, compared with other ammoniafed SOFC systems, the two cascade configuration -based systems show significant improvements in both efficiency and cost.
Titulo: Energetic and economic analysis of novel cascade systems for ammonia-fed solid oxide fuel cell
